mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(news_id, editor_id, news_title, news_create, news_content, news_word, publisher, news_modified) VALUES(#{newsId}, #{editorId}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsCreate}, #{newsContent}, #{newsWord}, #{publisher}, #{newsModified})
mapper.select: SELECT news_id, editor_id, news_title, news_create, news_content, news_word, publisher, news_modified FROM news WHERE news_id = #{value}
